text: Erdélyi is a word of Hungarian origin, meaning “related to Transylvania”. * Arthur Erdélyi (1908–1977) — Hungarian-born British mathematician * János Erdélyi (1814–1868) — Hungarian poet, critic, author, philosopher and ethnographist * Stefan Erdélyi (1905–1968) — Hungarian-Romanian chess master * Tamás Erdélyi — professor of mathematics at Texas A&M; University * Vasile Erdelyi (1794-1862) - Romanian Greek Catholic bishop of Oradea Mare * Tommy Ramone aka. Thomas Erdelyi, born Erdélyi Tamás (b. 1949) — Hungarian American record producer and musician == See also == * Erdélyi Napló — Hungarian language weekly published in Romania * Hungarian Hound aka. Erdélyi Kopó — breed of dog
title: Erdélyi
